name: sequelize-prac
description: - Sequelize is an Object-Relational Mapper (ORM) and can access SQL databases from Node.js - `npm install sequelize` - Sequelize will transform our JS to SQL, and pass it off to pg (PostgreSQL server), allowing node to talk to PostgreSQL - We DON'T have a Sequelize database. We have a PostgreSQL database. Sequelize is a transformer/interface that maps JS into SQL, and vice-versa
